title: "This Week In React #223: TanStack, React Router, React-Scan, Bun, Next.js, INP, Storybook | State of RN, Nitro Views, Reanimated, Gesture Handler, Screens, AWS-LC, QuickPush, Metro | TC39, CSS, TypeScript, Observables..."

segments.content:
* **React**: A good mix of content and many community articles, but no major announcements.
* **React Native**: The 2024 survey results are out, infra libraries now support RN 0.78, and Nitro Views have been released!
* **Other**: Several TC39 proposals are progressing—my favorites are `import defer` and `RegExp.escape()`.
segments.sourceMdx:
- **React**: A good mix of content and many community articles, but no major announcements.
- **React Native**: The 2024 survey results are out, infra libraries now support RN 0.78, and Nitro Views have been released!
- **Other**: Several TC39 proposals are progressing—my favorites are `import defer` and `RegExp.escape()`.
segments.translated_content:
- **React**: 丰富的社区文章内容，但无重大公告发布
- **React Native**: 2024年开发者调查结果出炉，基础库已支持RN 0.78版本，Nitro Views正式发布
- **其他**: 多项TC39提案取得进展——个人最关注的是`import defer`和`RegExp.escape()`

segments.content: Check our partner [StrapiConf](https://conf.strapi.io/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇫🇷 Paris - 13 May. Strapi is a popular headless CMS in the React ecosystem, and like me, it's French 🥐! Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR".
segments.sourceMdx: Check our partner [StrapiConf](https://conf.strapi.io/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇫🇷 Paris - 13 May. Strapi is a popular headless CMS in the React ecosystem, and like me, it's French 🥐! Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR".
segments.translated_content: 合作伙伴活动：[StrapiConf](https://conf.strapi.io/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇫🇷 巴黎 - 5月13日。Strapi是React生态中广受欢迎的无头CMS，和我一样来自法国🥐！使用优惠码"TWIR"可享9折

segments.content: [React-admin](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/?ref=TWIR) is the go-to framework for building B2B apps—because let’s be real, nobody dreams of writing yet another CRUD screen. Here’s why thousands of developers swear by it:
segments.sourceMdx: [React-admin](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/?ref=TWIR) is the go-to framework for building B2B apps—because let’s be real, nobody dreams of writing yet another CRUD screen. Here’s why thousands of developers swear by it:
segments.translated_content: [React-admin](https://marmelab.com/react-admin/?ref=TWIR)是构建B2B应用的首选框架——毕竟没人愿意反复编写CRUD界面。以下是它深受开发者信赖的原因：

segments.content:
* 🔌 **Backend Agnostic:** Connects to any API—because commitment issues aren't just for relationships.
* 🧩 **200+ Building Blocks:** More pre-built components than your project has TODOs.
* 🛠 **Complete Customization:** If you don’t like it, change it. We won’t take it personally (\*wipes away tears\*).
* 💻 **Great Developer Experience:** Makes you feel like a coding rockstar, minus the groupies (unless you count rubber ducks).
segments.sourceMdx:
- 🔌 **Backend Agnostic:** Connects to any API—because commitment issues aren't just for relationships.
- 🧩 **200+ Building Blocks:** More pre-built components than your project has TODOs.
- 🛠 **Complete Customization:** If you don’t like it, change it. We won’t take it personally (\*wipes away tears\*).
- 💻 **Great Developer Experience:** Makes you feel like a coding rockstar, minus the groupies (unless you count rubber ducks).
segments.translated_content:
- 🔌 **后端无关性**：适配任何API——就像对待感情关系一样不必专一
- 🧩 **200+预制组件**：比你的待办清单还要丰富
- 🛠 **完全可定制**：随心修改无需顾虑（*擦泪*）
- 💻 **卓越开发体验**：让你体验编码摇滚巨星的快感（橡皮鸭听众除外）

segments.content: With 7 years in production and 1 million daily users, react-admin is a sure bet. So why don’t you [try it out](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin?ref=TWIR) yourself?
segments.sourceMdx: With 7 years in production and 1 million daily users, react-admin is a sure bet. So why don’t you [try it out](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin?ref=TWIR) yourself?
segments.translated_content: 历经7年生产环境验证，日均百万用户量，react-admin是值得信赖的选择。立即[试用](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin?ref=TWIR)体验

segments.content:
* 💸 [AI coding benchmarks for backends](https://convex.link/thisweekbench)
* 👀 [React Explorer - Turns your React site into an interactive visualization](https://www.react-explorer.com/)
* 📖 [Deno docs - Build an app with TanStack and Deno](https://docs.deno.com/examples/tanstack_tutorial/)
* 🗓 [React-Summit](https://reactsummit.com/?utm_source=Newsletter\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) - 🇳🇱 Amsterdam - 13 & 17 June. CFP is closing soon on March 2! Last chance to submit your talks for a top-tier tech audience.
* 📜 [How Preply improved INP on a Next.js application (without React Server Components and App Router)](https://medium.com/preply-engineering/how-preply-improved-inp-on-a-next-js-application-without-react-server-components-and-app-router-491713149875): A deep dive into this Core Web Vital metrics and various things Preply tried to improve it, using a data-driven approach.
* 📜 [Avoiding Server Component Waterfall Fetching with React 19 cache()](https://aurorascharff.no/posts/avoiding-server-component-waterfall-fetching-with-react-19-cache/): You can use `React.cache()` to deduplicate requests and preload data as soon as possible to avoid request waterfalls. This works but creates an implicit coupling. I’d prefer a more explicit model, hoisting all requests and passing promises down as props.
* 📜 [Armin's TanStack Router Notes](https://gist.github.com/mitsuhiko/555b45f020a8d7e389516b51f6d03534): Documents challenges encountered while trying to determine whether Sentry could adopt TanStack Router.
* 📜 [There’s no such thing as an isomorphic layout effect](https://smoores.dev/post/no_such_thing_isomorphic_layout_effect/): A possible interpretation of the story behind the `useIsomorphicLayoutEffect` pattern.
* 📜 [Debouncing in React Router v7](https://programmingarehard.com/2025/02/24/debouncing-in-react-router-v7.html/): Interesting technique relying on `clientLoader`
* 📜 [How to Download a file from a React Router route](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/download-a-file-from-a-react-router-route): With/without dynamic params, with/without JS.
* 📜 [Shadcn Registry: A Better Way to Manage Your UI Components](https://ouassim.tech/notes/shadcn-registry-a-better-way-to-manage-your-ui-components/)
* 📜 [Throwing vs. Returning Redirects in React Router](https://sergiodxa.com/articles/throwing-vs-returning-redirects-in-react-router)
* 📜 [Functional programming in React](https://www.56kode.com/posts/level-up-react-functional-programming-in-react/)
* 📜 [React Performance: Common Problems & Their Solutions](https://blog.sentry.io/react-js-performance-guide/)
* 📜 [Making Next.js Apps Faster: A Practical Performance Guide Beyond Next.js](https://tigerabrodi.blog/making-nextjs-apps-faster-a-practical-performance-guide-beyond-nextjs)
* 📜 [Progressive forms with server actions](https://waku.gg/blog/progressive-forms)
* 📦 [Create TanStack Router App 0.4 - Add-ons, SolidJS support, MCP support](https://github.com/TanStack/create-tsrouter-app/releases/tag/v0.4.0)
* 📦 [React Scan 0.2 - Slowdown notifications, explanations and pre-generated prompts to fix them](https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan/releases/tag/v0.2.0)
* 📦 [React Scan Chrome Extension](https://github.com/jantimon/chrome-react-scan-inspector)
* 📦 [Storybook 8.6 - Storybook Test improvements](https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/releases/tag/v8.6.0)
* 📦 [React Admin 5.6 - Black & white theme](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin/releases/tag/v5.6.0)
* 📦 [Bun 1.2.3 - Built-in React support with hot-reloading, React init template](https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v1.2.3)
* 🔨 [Laravel Starter Kits](https://laravel.com/starter-kits): Include a new official React 19 + Inertia 2 starter kit.
* 🔨 [Remix Epic Stack update - Passkeys, Helmets, and more!](https://github.com/epicweb-dev/epic-stack/discussions/937)
* 🎥 [Jack Herrington - Fix Your Slow React App With React-Scan](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3EnathFYgz8)
* 🎥 [Syntax - Should You Use Signals with React?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Diy4XRSFTiA)
* 🎥 [Cosden - Combining React Query With Server Components (Next.js)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XcUpTPbY4Wg)

segments.translated_content:
- 💸 [后端AI编程基准测试](https://convex.link/thisweekbench)
- 👀 [React Explorer - 将你的React站点转化为交互式可视化](https://www.react-explorer.com/)
- 📖 [Deno文档 - 使用TanStack和Deno构建应用](https://docs.deno.com/examples/tanstack_tutorial/)
- 🗓 [React-Summit](https://reactsummit.com/?utm_source=Newsletter&utm_medium=thisweekinreact) - 🇳🇱 阿姆斯特丹 - 6月13日 & 17日。CFP即将于3月2日截止！最后机会向顶级技术观众提交演讲提案。
- 📜 [Preply如何在不使用React服务器组件和应用路由的情况下改进Next.js应用的INP指标](https://medium.com/preply-engineering/how-preply-improved-inp-on-a-next-js-application-without-react-server-components-and-app-router-491713149875): 深度探讨核心网页指标及Preply采取的数据驱动优化方案。
- 📜 [使用React 19 cache()避免服务器组件瀑布式请求](https://aurorascharff.no/posts/avoiding-server-component-waterfall-fetching-with-react-19-cache/): 通过`React.cache()`可去重请求并预加载数据以避免请求瀑布流。虽有效但会产生隐式耦合，更推荐将所有请求提升并作为promise属性显式传递的模型。
- 📜 [Armin的TanStack Router笔记](https://gist.github.com/mitsuhiko/555b45f020a8d7e389516b51f6d03534): 记录评估Sentry是否采用TanStack Router时遇到的挑战。
- 📜 [同构布局效果并不存在](https://smoores.dev/post/no_such_thing_isomorphic_layout_effect/): 对`useIsomorphicLayoutEffect`模式背后逻辑的一种解读。
- 📜 [React Router v7中的防抖实现](https://programmingarehard.com/2025/02/24/debouncing-in-react-router-v7.html/): 基于`clientLoader`的巧妙技术方案
- 📜 [如何从React Router路由下载文件](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/download-a-file-from-a-react-router-route): 含动态参数/不含动态参数，启用/禁用JS的不同场景实现。
- 📜 [Shadcn注册表：更优的UI组件管理方案](https://ouassim.tech/notes/shadcn-registry-a-better-way-to-manage-your-ui-components/)
- 📜 [React Router中抛出重定向与返回重定向的对比](https://sergiodxa.com/articles/throwing-vs-returning-redirects-in-react-router)
- 📜 [React中的函数式编程实践](https://www.56kode.com/posts/level-up-react-functional-programming-in-react/)
- 📜 [React性能优化：常见问题与解决方案](https://blog.sentry.io/react-js-performance-guide/)
- 📜 [Next.js应用性能提升实战指南](https://tigerabrodi.blog/making-nextjs-apps-faster-a-practical-performance-guide-beyond-nextjs)
- 📜 [渐进式表单与服务端动作](https://waku.gg/blog/progressive-forms)
- 📦 [Create TanStack Router App 0.4 - 新增插件系统、SolidJS支持、MCP支持](https://github.com/TanStack/create-tsrouter-app/releases/tag/v0.4.0)
- 📦 [React Scan 0.2 - 新增性能瓶颈通知、解释说明及修复建议自动生成](https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan/releases/tag/v0.2.0)
- 📦 [React Scan Chrome扩展](https://github.com/jantimon/chrome-react-scan-inspector)
- 📦 [Storybook 8.6 - 测试功能增强](https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/releases/tag/v8.6.0)
- 📦 [React Admin 5.6 - 新增黑白主题](https://github.com/marmelab/react-admin/releases/tag/v5.6.0)
- 📦 [Bun 1.2.3 - 内置React热重载支持，新增React初始化模板](https://bun.sh/blog/bun-v1.2.3)
- 🔨 [Laravel入门套件](https://laravel.com/starter-kits): 新增官方React 19 + Inertia 2启动模板。
- 🔨 [Remix Epic Stack更新 - 支持通行密钥、Helmet组件等](https://github.com/epicweb-dev/epic-stack/discussions/937)
- 🎥 [Jack Herrington - 使用React-Scan优化React应用性能](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3EnathFYgz8)
- 🎥 [Syntax - 是否该在React中使用Signals？](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Diy4XRSFTiA)
- 🎥 [Cosden - 在Next.js中结合React Query与服务器组件](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XcUpTPbY4Wg)

segments.content: Meticulous creates and maintains an exhaustive suite of e2e ui tests with **zero** developer effort.
segments.sourceMdx: Meticulous creates and maintains an exhaustive suite of e2e ui tests with **zero** developer effort.
segments.translated_content: Meticulous以**零**开发工作量创建并维护一套完整的端到端UI测试套件。

segments.content: Dropbox, Bilt Rewards, Lattice and hundreds of engineering organizations rely on Meticulous for their frontend testing.
segments.sourceMdx: Dropbox, Bilt Rewards, Lattice and hundreds of engineering organizations rely on Meticulous for their frontend testing.
segments.translated_content: Dropbox、Bilt Rewards、Lattice等数百家工程组织依赖Meticulous进行前端测试。

segments.content: This quote from the CTO of Traba sums the product up best: "Meticulous has fundamentally changed the way we approach frontend testing in our web applications, fully eliminating the need to write any frontend tests. The software gives us confidence that every change will be completely regression tested, allowing us to ship more quickly with significantly fewer bugs in our code."
segments.sourceMdx: This quote from the CTO of Traba sums the product up best: "Meticulous has fundamentally changed the way we approach frontend testing in our web applications, fully eliminating the need to write any frontend tests. The software gives us confidence that every change will be completely regression tested, allowing us to ship more quickly with significantly fewer bugs in our code."
segments.translated_content: Traba首席技术官的这句评价最能概括产品价值："Meticulous从根本上改变了我们在Web应用中处理前端测试的方式，完全消除了编写前端测试的需求。该软件让我们确信每次变更都将经过完整的回归测试，使我们能够更快地交付代码，同时显著减少缺陷。"

segments.content: This [post](https://www.meticulous.ai/blog/lessons-from-a-decade?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_campaign=jan15th) from our CTO, who formerly led a large engineering group at Palantir, sets out the context of why exhaustive testing can double engineering velocity.
segments.sourceMdx: This [post](https://www.meticulous.ai/blog/lessons-from-a-decade?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_campaign=jan15th) from our CTO, who formerly led a large engineering group at Palantir, sets out the context of why exhaustive testing can double engineering velocity.
segments.translated_content: 阅读我们CTO的这篇[文章](https://www.meticulous.ai/blog/lessons-from-a-decade?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_campaign=jan15th)（他曾在Palantir领导大型工程团队），了解为何全面测试能使工程效率翻倍。

segments.content: The survey results are out and I’m super proud that among all the React Native resources, this newsletter got the highest positivity score. Thank you ❤️!
segments.sourceMdx: The survey results are out and I’m super proud that among all the React Native resources, this newsletter got the highest positivity score. Thank you ❤️!
segments.translated_content: 调查结果已出炉，最让我自豪的是在所有React Native资源中，本通讯获得了最高积极评价。感谢大家 ❤️！

segments.content: I can’t summarize the whole survey, but here are a few things I discovered:
segments.sourceMdx: I can’t summarize the whole survey, but here are a few things I discovered:
segments.translated_content: 我无法概括整个调查，但以下是我发现的一些要点：

segments.content:
* 61% of RN devs came from React (web)
* iOS and Android remain the most common RN targets, but the Web also has a 22% market share
* Libraries with the most positive sentiment are: Reanimated, TanStack Query, Zustand, React Navigation, Expo Router, Skia.
* No clear winner in terms of styling. Devs like the built-in APIs such as StyleSheet and inline styles.
segments.sourceMdx:
- 61% of RN devs came from React (web)
- iOS and Android remain the most common RN targets, but the Web also has a 22% market share
- Libraries with the most positive sentiment are: Reanimated, TanStack Query, Zustand, React Navigation, Expo Router, Skia.
- No clear winner in terms of styling. Devs like the built-in APIs such as StyleSheet and inline styles.
segments.translated_content:
- 61%的RN开发者来自React（Web端）
- iOS和Android仍是主要开发目标，但Web平台也占据22%市场份额
- 最受好评的库包括：Reanimated、TanStack Query、Zustand、React Navigation、Expo Router、Skia
- 样式方案没有明确赢家，开发者偏好StyleSheet等内置API和内联样式

segments.content:
* 💸 [PostHog - How we built mobile replay (and why it took so long)](https://dub.link/twir-feb26)
* 📜 [How to build Custom Tabs with Expo Router UI](https://expo.dev/blog/how-to-build-custom-tabs-with-expo-router-ui)
* 🗓️ [App.js Conf](https://appjs.co/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) -  🇵🇱 Kraków - 28-30 May. Don't miss your chance to grab your tickets and benefit from an exclusive 15% discount using the code "TWIR".
* 📦 [Nitro 0.23 - Nitro Views](https://github.com/mrousavy/nitro/releases/tag/v0.23.0): A new convenient and perfomant way to integrate native Swift / Kotlin views into React Native apps. Requires 0.78+ and New Arch.
* 📦 [Reanimated 3.17 - Edge-to-Edge, LAB color space, animate `boxShadow`](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-reanimated/releases/tag/3.17.0): Support for RN 0.78 coming in 3.17.1 soon.
* 📦 [React Native Boost - A powerful Babel plugin that automatically optimizes React Native apps](https://github.com/kuatsu/react-native-boost): Apply safe AST micro-optimizations to boost performance, like using faster native Text/View components instead of the RN JS wrappers.
* 📦 [AWS-LibCrypto](https://github.com/OP-Engineering/op-aws-lc): RN bindings to Rust AWS lib, with FIPS certification from the US government.
* 📦 [Screens 4.8 - Android 16 KB page size](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-screens/releases/tag/4.8.0)
* 📦 [Screens 4.9 - RN 0.78](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-screens/releases/tag/4.9.0)
* 📦 [Gesture Handler 2.24 - RN 0.78, Android 16 KB page size support](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-gesture-handler/releases/tag/2.24.0)
* 📦 [QuickPush - A lightweight macOS menu bar utility for quickly testing Expo push notifications](https://github.com/betomoedano/quick-push)
* 📦 [Metro 0.81.2 - Package exports to clearly define public API surface, perf, experimental flags](https://github.com/facebook/metro/releases/tag/v0.81.2)
* 🔨 [VSCode Extension for React Native Directory](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=react-native-directory.vscode-react-native-directory): Find and install the right RND packages directly from your IDE.

segments.content:
* 👀 [Chromium - Intent to ship Observables API in Chrome 135](https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/g/blink-dev/c/stxSgTgMHog)
* 🎮 [Anchoreum - A game for learning CSS Anchor Positioning](https://anchoreum.com/): I didn’t expect Anchor Positioning to be as powerful. It’s in Interop 2025 and likely to land in all browsers this year, so now is a great time to learn!
* 📜 [TC39 Advances 3 Proposals to Stage 4: RegExp Escaping, Float16Array, and Redeclarable global eval vars](https://socket.dev/blog/tc39-advances-3-proposals-to-stage-4-regexp-escaping-float16array-and-redeclarable-global-eval)
* 📜 [Extreme Server-Side Rendering](https://www.scd31.com/posts/extreme-server-side-rendering): Keeping the connection alive, a server can stream updates continuously to the client. The author implemented a Flappy Bird game relying on this technique, without any JS.
* 📜 [Testing Web Authentication (WebAuthn)](https://www.heal.dev/docs/blog/testing-webauthn): TIL you can leverage Chrome DevTools features in Playwright.
* 📜 [Speeding up the JavaScript ecosystem - Rust and JavaScript Plugins](https://marvinh.dev/blog/speeding-up-javascript-ecosystem-part-11/)
* 📜 [A Million Little Secrets - Deconstructing the “Whimsical Animations” landing page](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/blog/whimsical-animations/)
* 📜 [Subverting control with weak references](https://jlongster.com/subverting-control-weak-refs)
* 🎥 [TypeScript types can run DOOM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0mCsluv5FXA): Just 🤯.
segments.sourceMdx:
- 👀 [Chromium \- Intent to ship Observables API in Chrome 135](https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/g/blink-dev/c/stxSgTgMHog)
- 🎮 [Anchoreum \- A game for learning CSS Anchor Positioning](https://anchoreum.com/): I didn’t expect Anchor Positioning to be as powerful. It’s in Interop 2025 and likely to land in all browsers this year, so now is a great time to learn\!
- 📜 [TC39 Advances 3 Proposals to Stage 4: RegExp Escaping, Float16Array, and Redeclarable global eval vars](https://socket.dev/blog/tc39-advances-3-proposals-to-stage-4-regexp-escaping-float16array-and-redeclarable-global-eval)
- 📜 [Extreme Server-Side Rendering](https://www.scd31.com/posts/extreme-server-side-rendering): Keeping the connection alive, a server can stream updates continuously to the client. The author implemented a Flappy Bird game relying on this technique, without any JS.
- 📜 [Testing Web Authentication (WebAuthn)](https://www.heal.dev/docs/blog/testing-webauthn): TIL you can leverage Chrome DevTools features in Playwright.
- 📜 [Speeding up the JavaScript ecosystem \- Rust and JavaScript Plugins](https://marvinh.dev/blog/speeding-up-javascript-ecosystem-part-11/)
- 📜 [A Million Little Secrets \- Deconstructing the “Whimsical Animations” landing page](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/blog/whimsical-animations/)
- 📜 [Subverting control with weak references](https://jlongster.com/subverting-control-weak-refs)
- 🎥 [TypeScript types can run DOOM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0mCsluv5FXA): Just 🤯.
segments.translated_content:
- 👀 [Chromium - 计划在 Chrome 135 中推出 Observables API](https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/g/blink-dev/c/stxSgTgMHog)
- 🎮 [Anchoreum - 学习 CSS 锚点定位的游戏](https://anchoreum.com/)：没想到锚点定位功能如此强大。它已被纳入 Interop 2025 标准，预计今年将在所有浏览器中实现，现在正是学习的好时机！
- 📜 [TC39 将三项提案推进至 Stage 4：正则表达式转义、Float16Array 和可重声明全局 eval 变量](https://socket.dev/blog/tc39-advances-3-proposals-to-stage-4-regexp-escaping-float16array-and-redeclarable-global-eval)
- 📜 [极限服务端渲染](https://www.scd31.com/posts/extreme-server-side-rendering)：通过保持连接存活，服务器可以持续向客户端流式传输更新。作者利用这一技术实现了无需任何 JavaScript 的 Flappy Bird 游戏。
- 📜 [测试 Web 认证（WebAuthn）](https://www.heal.dev/docs/blog/testing-webauthn)：原来可以在 Playwright 中利用 Chrome 开发者工具的功能。
- 📜 [加速 JavaScript 生态 - Rust 与 JavaScript 插件](https://marvinh.dev/blog/speeding-up-javascript-ecosystem-part-11/)
- 📜 [百万个小秘密 - 解构“奇思妙想动画”落地页](https://www.joshwcomeau.com/blog/whimsical-animations/)
- 📜 [用弱引用颠覆控制](https://jlongster.com/subverting-control-weak-refs)
- 🎥 [TypeScript 类型可以运行 DOOM](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0mCsluv5FXA)：简直令人震惊 🤯。
